description: Number of letters in n (in Dutch).
comments: The 'ij' in 'vijf' has been counted as one letter here. Counting it as one or two letters are both common in Dutch. - _Andr√© Engels_, Dec 07 2003
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to number of letters in n
crossrefs: A090589 gives the sequence when 'ij' is counted as two letters.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
